CustomField.description: Maximum number of times to retry the LLM callout upon encountering specific transient errors (e.g., 429 Too Many Requests, 5xx Server Errors). Set to 0 to disable retries.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of retry attempts (e.g., 3 means initial call + up to 3 retries). Uses framework defaults if blank. Set to 0 to disable.
CustomField.label: Max Retry Attempts
